thread.section_title: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul | oceanebeauty.com
thread.title: Sonia Delano McSweeney
thread.title_full: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul reviewed by Sonia Delano McSweeney

author: Sonia Delano McSweeney
title: Sonia Delano McSweeney
text:
Hi - I recently contacted the company with a question about one of their products. They were prompt, respectful and very, very helpful. They got in touch within hours and they were happy to help by replacing the product, which was sent ground UPS and I got it in two days. I'm really very impressed - VERY impressed, with the customer service. I highly recommend this company - and wonderful products.
Thank you, Oceane!
` Sonia McSweeney
